florid.translation[0].definitions[0].def: a florid face is red in colour
florid.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: a middle-aged man with a florid complexion
florid.translation[0].definitions[1].def: florid language, music, or art has a lot of extra unnecessary details or decorations
florid.translation[0].definitions[1].exa: a book written in a very florid style
